  name: string;
  symbol: string;
  uri: string;
  sellerFeeBasisPoints: number;
  creators: Option<Array<Creator>>;

  uses: Option<Uses>;

export type DataV2Args = {
  name: string;
  symbol: string;
  uri: string;
  sellerFeeBasisPoints: number;
  creators: OptionOrNullable<Array<CreatorArgs>>;
  collection: OptionOrNullable<CollectionArgs>;

};
